## ``argonDashFooter``

Create a Boostrap 4 dashboard footer

#### Description

Build an argon dashboard footer

#### Usage

<pre><code>

argonDashFooter(..., copyrights = NULL, src = NULL)

</code></pre>

#### Arguments

* ``...``: Slot for argonFooterMenu.
* ``copyrights``: Left text, if any.
* ``src``: Left text src, if any.
